name: langevitour
description: An HTML widget that randomly tours 2D projections of numerical data.

scripts.sync-versions: VERSION=$(grep '^Version:' DESCRIPTION | cut -d' ' -f2) && sed 's/^  \"version\":.*/  \"version\": \"'$VERSION'\",/' package.json >package.json.new && mv package.json.new package.json && sed 's/^   version:.*/   version: \"'$VERSION'\"/' inst/htmlwidgets/langevitour.yaml >inst/htmlwidgets/langevitour.yaml.new && mv inst/htmlwidgets/langevitour.yaml.new inst/htmlwidgets/langevitour.yaml && hatch version $VERSION
scripts.build: npm run sync-versions && npm run js-build && npm run js-docs && npm run r-docs && npm run py-build

author: Paul Harrison
